BBXS1.Q.I7.S.EUBUCS.MANU.MAN013.TT.PCT.I: Business and consumer surveys (European Commission) / Capacity utilization (man) / Seasonally adjusted only / Euro area 18 (fixed composition)
Source: European Commision - Directorate-General for Economic and Financial Affairs (DG ECFIN)

Methodology: Data are collected at the beginning of the quarters.  / The consideration of the results of the several member states is fully retrospective according each existing time series for all countries of the aggregate.  / Aggregates are calculated as weighted averages of the country-aggregate replies. The weights are annually calculated in august: The country weights of the year t are calculated from the weights of year t and the weights of the year before (t-1).  / Reference time series of the weights: gross value added (bn EUR) at constant prices (2005), industry excluding building and construction.
